column12: METHODS AND SYSTEMS OF EVALUATING AXONAL LOSS AND DEMYELINATION
column13: Disclosed are methods and systems for obtaining ultra-high b radial diffusion-weighted imaging signals from a selected portion of a nervous system of a subject and comparing at least two ultra-high b radial diffusion-weighted imaging signals for the selected portion of the nervous system of the subject. The comparison is indicative of changes in the integrity or intactness of a bundle of axons within the selected portion of the nervous system of the subject.
column15: JEONG EUN KEE E K;;SAPKOTA NABRAJ;;JEONG KYLE;;LEE YOUJUNG;;THAPA BIJAYA;;ROSE JOHN W;;SHAH LUBDHA;;BISSON ERICA
column16: UNIVERSITY OF UTAH RESEARCH FOUNDATION (2019-04-25);;UNIVERSITY OF UTAH (2019-04-11)

column12: Methods and systems of evaluating axonal loss and demyelination
column13: Ultra-high b radial diffusion-weighted imaging signals can be obtained from a selected portion of a nervous system of a subject. At least two ultra-high b radial diffusion-weighted imaging signals for the selected portion of the nervous system of the subject can be compared. The comparison is indicative of changes in the integrity or intactness of a bundle of axons within the selected portion of the nervous system of the subject.
